# About us

Sara institute is a nonprofit data science organisation in Delhi NCR, India. Our dream is to empower marginalized communities using data science. 

Every year, we admit thirty students from underrepresented communities and give them free residential data science education, projects, and job training. We believe for a better world data science needs to have a diverse perspective.
